requirements.summary: Update the hardcoded admin credentials in the frontend authentication hook to use username 'ANAS' and password 'Anas@2020'
acceptanceCriteria: Admin login form accepts username 'ANAS' with password 'Anas@2020'
Session storage and authentication state management remain unchanged

file_operations.description: Update the hardcoded ADMIN_USERNAME constant from 'admin' to 'ANAS' and ADMIN_PASSWORD constant from 'admin123' to 'Anas@2020' in the useAdminAuth hook. Do not modify any other logic including the login function, sessionStorage handling, or state management.
